data.text:
Subsections:

Bioswales

Sustainable stormwater management treats and slows runoff from impervious roadways, sidewalks, and building surfaces. In urban areas, natural drainage patterns have changed over time due to the incremental increase of impervious surface areas. Hardscapes, such as concrete and asphalt, prevent
